page.title: 14MOTORWAY AND MOORLAND
page.content:
The noise of the motorway, The sound of rumbling lorries, Roaring very load. As they hurtle past. Watch them go zooming by; Buses, vans, motorbikes and scooters, Coaches, lorries, cars and all. The horrible, breath-taking smell, Of exhaust fumes, caused by vehicles; The busy motorway, the noisy motorway, The never ending motorway.
The peaceful tranquility of the moors, The stillness, the quiet moorland; The rustle of wind, through the grass, Sheep and cows grazing, birds singing. The hills, coloured patchwork. The gentle air, breezing through, The smell of new mown hay.
